raw: The United Kingdom on Tuesday announced a new post - Brexit tariff regime to replace the European Union ’s external tariff , maintaining a 10 % tariff on cars but cutting levies on tens of billions of dollars of supply chain imports .
replaced: Britain on Tuesday announced a new post - Brexit tariff regime to replace the UK tariff  EU ’s external tariff , maintaining a 10 % tariff on cars but cutting levies on tens of billions of dollars of supply chain imports .

raw: After decades outsourcing its trade policy to the European Union , Britain is embarking on negotiating free trade agreements with countries around the world and aims to have deals in place covering 80 % of British trade within three years .
replaced: After decades outsourcing Britain trade policy to EU , Britain is embarking on negotiating free trade agreements with countries around the world and aims to have deals in place covering 80 % of British trade within three years .

raw: The British government said the new regime , known as UK Global Tariff ( UKGT ) , would be simpler and cheaper than the EU ’s Common External Tariff .
replaced: Britain said new post-Brexit global tariff regime  new post-Brexit global tariff regime , would be simpler and cheaper than The UKGT  EU ’s Common External Tariff .

raw: It will apply to countries with which it has no agreement and will remove all tariffs below 2 % .
replaced: new post-Brexit global tariff regime will apply to countries with which Britain has no agreement and will remove all tariffs below 2 % .

raw: “ Our new Global Tariff will benefit UK consumers and households by cutting red tape and reducing the cost of thousands of everyday products , ” International Trade Secretary Liz Truss said .
replaced: “ Britain  The UKGT will benefit UK consumers and households by cutting red tape and reducing the cost of thousands of everyday products , ” International Trade Secretary Liz Truss said .

raw: The UKGT will be set in pounds and will be legislated for later in the year and will come into force from January 2021 .
replaced: The UKGT will be set in pounds and will be legislated for later in the year and will come into force from January 2021 .

raw: Under the new regime tariffs would be eliminated on a wide range of products : 60 % of trade will come into the UK tariff free on WTO terms or through existing preferential access , the government said .
replaced: Under the new regime tariffs would be eliminated on a wide range of products : 60 % of trade will come into the UK tariff  UK tariff free on WTO terms or through existing preferential access , Britain said .

raw: The UK will maintain tariffs on a number of products backing UK industries such as agriculture , automotive and fishing .
replaced: UK will maintain tariffs on a number of products backing UK industries such as agriculture , automotive and fishing .

raw: It will remove tariffs on 30 billion pounds ( $ 37 billion ) worth of imports entering UK supply chains such as screws and bolts .
replaced: UK will remove tariffs on 30 billion pounds ( $ 37 billion ) worth of imports entering UK supply chains such as screws and bolts .

raw: The government said it would also remove tariffs on products which support energy efficiency such as thermostats and LED lamps , and will introduce a temporary zero tariff rate on products being use to fight the COVID-19 outbreak such as personal protective equipment .
replaced: Britain said Britain would also remove tariffs on products which support energy efficiency such as thermostats and LED lamps , and will introduce a temporary zero tariff rate on products being use to fight the COVID-19 outbreak such as personal protective equipment .
